medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient awoke this morning around 7:30 AM with acute periumbilical abdominal pain that became more severe throughout the day and began to localize to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). He experienced several episodes of soft to loose stools and emesis, primarily of previously ingested food. The pain was aggravated by attempts to eat breakfast.
medical_history.social_history: The patient had a large dinner at a restaurant with friends the previous night, but none of the friends are sick today.
